item.title: Using ESPN Forecasts to Make Draft King Final Fantasy Football Picks
item.description: ESPN fantasy football projection are free and available historically. Although they differ from DraftKing, they are granular enough to be converted and compared. Let’s see their predictive power In this post we’ll use ESPN predictions to optimize our fantasy pool. You can skip to the bottom for the code or just visit my github. For more information on R programming for data science, I recommend the book Practical Statistics for Data Scientists

item.title: Using Linear Regression to Make Fantasy Football Picks
item.description: Optimize your fantasy football picks with a linear regression in just a few lines of code. Using a regression to predict fantasy football performance is easier than you think in R. With a few lines of code, you can predict player performance and optimize your lineup. In a prior post, I wrote about using linear programming to optimize your fantasy football picks.
